doc.title: Girls, Robots, and Digital Cameras
doc.plot: We're told from a young age that we are all special. To some people that just doesn't make any sense. Michael, Leonard, and Herman all have their own problems to deal with. Heartbreak, parents, and new technology come into play when these three cynics get together and talk with each other's families at a local diner. A humorous look at Chinese culture, young relationships, and confused senior citizens.
